text:
"Eulalia!" is a children's fantasy book. It's the nineteenth book in the "Redwall" novel series, and was written by Brian Jacques in 2007.
Plot.
Vizka Longtooth, a wicked fox pirate, captures a young badger named Gorath. At the same time, the old badger king of the mountain Salamandastron tells a young female hare named Maudie to go and find a new badger to be king after he dies. At Redwall Abbey, a young hedgehog named Orkwil Prink gets kicked out of the abbey because he keeps stealing stuff. What will happen to these three animals and the wicked fox pirate?
